Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'A Secluded Conference Room', 2: 'Babylonia'}
{3: 'Babylonia, a secluded conference room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's ten minutes past the scheduled time. Everyone should be here by now, so let's begin.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Thrown together at a single table are the Gray Raven members, the Cerberus captain, a musician from WGAA, a taciturn maid, and a devil-tailed mechanoid girl... It sounds like the start of a bad joke, making the scene feel utterly bizarre.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Let me summarize the situation. A few days ago, the system automatically posted a birthday notification for the Gray Raven Commandant, visible only to the Commandant's contacts.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'At that very moment, everyone who replied to the post, myself included, received a meeting alert. It seems we are all being asked to collaborate on planning a suitable celebration.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Considering how busy Gray Raven has been with missions lately, the birthday should be a chance for proper rest. I could prepare a specialized recuperation plan.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Oh, come on, it's a birthday, not a medical check-up! Relaxing can mean having fun, you know? I should take the Chosen One to a secret spot, somewhere no one would ever find us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "An undisclosed location? I must voice my strong opposition to that idea. The Commandant's safety is paramount.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Across from her, the red-haired Construct leans on one arm, chuckling softly as she drums her fingers on the table.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Why is this even a debate? The Commandant isn't going anywhere. I've already got plans—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just finalized.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'The projection device at the end of the table suddenly hums and lights up on its own. The dragon-winged knight from the Church of Machina shows up in the image, frowning in displeasure.'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "Let's settle this with a duel. I'm not going to lose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "A beautiful piece of theatre doesn't require such intense conflict... I believe a day of peaceful, quiet happiness is a precious gift in itself for the Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{2: '(Am I even supposed to be hearing this...?)', 3: '56'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Familiar voices come through your earpiece, arguing about something, slowly waking you from a light afternoon nap.'}
{3: "You check your terminal. Turns out you got pulled into an online meeting. They're still busy debating over you, and no one's noticed you're already here."}
{2: '(Should I be saying something right now?)', 3: '62'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '11'}
{1: '11', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Meetings really do all fall into the same pattern... A small blessing the Commandant isn't here to witness this.", 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Everyone, please listen to me.', 4: '11'}
{3: "Liv seems to have made up her mind, drawing everyone's attention to herself."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If we can't agree on a single plan, perhaps we could each prepare our own gift or activity, and present all the options to the Commandant? Let the Commandant choose.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'After all, the star of that day is the Commandant.', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Everyone at the table falls silent for a moment, then starts nodding in agreement.'}
{2: 'Why do I suddenly feel kind of relieved?', 3: '79', 4: '(Sigh in relief)', 5: '79'}

{1: '11', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Ooh, I like that! Let\'s turn our plans into blind boxes and put them in a gacha machine! "A thrilling surprise in every pull!" Humans are totally into that these days, right?', 4: '11'}
{3: 'The little devil girl perks right up, waving her hand to open a few holographic screens and quickly building a cube model.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'The WGAA has dabbled in blind box projects. The key is in the presentation...', 4: '11'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hm? Did the signal just cut off?', 3: '95'}
{3: "Just as unexpectedly as it appeared, the meeting room feed cuts out. You try to reconnect, but it's gone without a trace, as if it never existed."}
{2: 'Could that be part of the design too...?', 3: '97', 4: "Now it's really making me curious.", 5: '97'}
{3: 'Lunch break is ending. With a burning curiosity to see how the situation will develop, you head back to work.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{1: "Commandant's Lounge, Babylonia", 2: 'Several Days Later'}
{3: "Several days later, Commandant's lounge, Babylonia."}
{3: 'The morning light feels soft and clear. Your schedule is completely empty. After being busy for so long, it feels strange to suddenly have a quiet day like this.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}

{3: 'When you open the door, there\'s a familiar-looking metal cube box sitting there. Printed on it in neat letters are the words: "To Gray Raven Commandant: Please place your hand on the marked area for 3 seconds."'}
{3: 'There\'s a little handwritten note stuck underneath: "If you don\'t do it, it\'ll jump up and bite you!"'}
{2: '(Try to find what might be the mouth on the box)', 3: '113', 4: "Alright, alright, I'll do it.", 5: '113'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}

{3: "You bring the box inside and place your hand on it like the instructions say. The box gives a soft hum, then a voice message starts to play. It's clearly been stitched together from different clips."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageOpen.prefab', 2: '3', 5: '4'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageLoop3.prefab', 2: '3', 5: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "You opened it that easily? Where's your vigilance?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Looks like I'll have to keep a much closer watch on you from now on. Let's be clear: consider yourself held hostage by this recording. No moving until it's finished.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You've told me about the rewards. What about the punishments?", 3: '130', 4: '(Instinctively flex your wrists)', 5: '130'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'To celebrate the day the universe was graced with you, Chosen One, I—ugh, fine, we—built this blind box machine.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Invitations, plans, keepsakes, clues... all are sealed within individual boxes, each a small mystery crafted for you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'The true magic lies in that moment when you open it with your own hands.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Each item inside is unique. Yet, they all share one common thread.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'We just hope you enjoy today, and every moment that comes after.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A rustling static sound rises, followed by soft laughter drifting from somewhere far away.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "Such conventional offerings from the others. They're squandering this precious, once-a-year chance. If you desire an experience that truly quickens the pulse... come find me. A delight, or a delicious fright?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageEnd.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageLoop3.prefab', 5: '5'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0', 5: '0.2'}
{3: 'The cube suddenly opens up, its metal pieces unfolding, flipping, and folding again like a flower blooming, revealing its precious core.'}
{3: 'There are eight small boxes, each different, and one sparkling message: "Happy Birthday!"'}
{3: 'Now then, which one should you open first?'}
